title: Chapter 3: Connecting with rclpy (Python Client Library)
description: The rclpy library is ROS 2's Python client. It allows you to write ROS 2 nodes using Python, making it easy for AI engineers to integrate their models and algorithms with a robot's communication system. This chapter will conceptually demonstrate how rclpy is used to create nodes, publish data, and subscribe to information from other parts of the robot.
